org.ranksys.compression.preferences

Class RatingCODECPreferenceData<U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.fast.preference.AbstractFastPreferenceData<U,I>
      • org.ranksys.compression.preferences.RatingCODECPreferenceData<U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of users
    I - type of items
    Cu - coding for user identifiers
    Ci - coding for item identifiers
    Cv - coding for ratings
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemIndex<I>, UserIndex<U>, PreferenceData<U,I>, FastItemIndex<I>, FastUserIndex<U>, FasterPreferenceData<U,I>, FastPreferenceData<U,I>

    public class RatingCODECPreferenceData<U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv>
extends AbstractFastPreferenceData<U,I>
implements FasterPreferenceData<U,I>
    PreferenceData for rating data using compression.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (Saul.Vargas@glasgow.ac.uk)

      • load

        public static <U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv> RatingCODECPreferenceData<U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv> load(String up,
                                                                          String ip,
                                                                          FastUserIndex<U> users,
                                                                          FastItemIndex<I> items,
                                                                          CODEC<Cu> u_codec,
                                                                          CODEC<Ci> i_codec,
                                                                          CODEC<Cv> r_codec)
                                                                   throws FileNotFoundException
        Reads two files for user and item preferences and builds a compressed PreferenceData. The format of the user preferences stream consists on one list per line, starting with the identifier of the user followed by the identifier-rating pairs of the items related to that. The item preferences stream follows the same format by swapping the roles of users and items.
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of users
        I - type of items
        Cu - coding for user identifiers
        Ci - coding for item identifiers
        Cv - coding for ratings
        Parameters:
        up - path to user preferences file
        ip - path to item preferences file
        users - user index
        items - item index
        u_codec - user preferences list CODEC
        i_codec - item preferences list CODEC
        r_codec - ratings CODEC
        Returns:
        compressed preference data
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - when one of the files does not exist

      • load

        public static <U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv> RatingCODECPreferenceData<U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv> load(InputStream uo,
                                                                          InputStream io,
                                                                          FastUserIndex<U> users,
                                                                          FastItemIndex<I> items,
                                                                          CODEC<Cu> u_codec,
                                                                          CODEC<Ci> i_codec,
                                                                          CODEC<Cv> r_codec)
        Reads two streams for user and item preferences and builds a compressed PreferenceData. The format of the user preferences stream consists on one list per line, starting with the identifier of the user followed by the identifier-rating pairs of the items related to that. The item preferences stream follows the same format by swapping the roles of users and items.
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of users
        I - type of items
        Cu - coding for user identifiers
        Ci - coding for item identifiers
        Cv - coding for ratings
        Parameters:
        uo - stream user preferences
        io - stream item preferences
        users - user index
        items - item index
        u_codec - user preferences list CODEC
        i_codec - item preferences list CODEC
        r_codec - ratings CODEC
        Returns:
        compressed preference data

        Parameters:

      • deserialize

        public static <U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv> RatingCODECPreferenceData<U,I,Cu,Ci,Cv> deserialize(String path,
                                                                                 CODEC<Cu> u_codec,
                                                                                 CODEC<Ci> i_codec,
                                                                                 CODEC<Cv> r_codec)
                                                                          throws IOException,
                                                                                 ClassNotFoundException
        De-serializes a compressed binary file to a PrefereceData instance.
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of user
        I - type of item
        Cu - coding for user preferences
        Ci - coding for item preferences
        Cv - coding for ratings
        Parameters:
        path - path to compressed binary file
        u_codec - user preferences list CODEC
        i_codec - item preferences list CODEC
        r_codec - ratings CODEC
        Returns:
        de-serialized PreferenceData instance
        Throws:
        IOException - when IO error
        ClassNotFoundException - when reading a bad binary file
